name: Ferrari
description: Legendary Italian sports car manufacturer with a strong F1 heritage.

name: Mercedes-Benz
description: Luxury car brand with dominant presence in F1 through Mercedes-AMG Petronas.

name: McLaren
description: British automotive and F1 powerhouse known for innovation.

name: Red Bull Racing
description: High-performing F1 team owned by Red Bull GmbH.

name: Toyota
description: Known for reliable vehicles and past F1 involvement.

name: Ford
description: Pioneered automobile mass production. Returning to F1 with Red Bull in 2026.

name: BMW
description: Luxury and performance, with a history in motorsport and F1.
